entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Snow at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
